org.javafxdata.datasources.provider

Interface ObjectProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ListProvider<T>, TableProvider<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ListProviderBase, ObjectDataSource, ObjectProviderBase, TableProviderBase

    public interface ObjectProvider
    An ObjectProvider is capable of providing an Observable Object to a consumer (e.g. a JavaFX Control).
    Author:
    johan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javafx.beans.Observable getData()
      Return the Object that is obtained by this provider.

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        javafx.beans.Observable getData()
        Return the Object that is obtained by this provider. The return Object is an implementation of Observable, hence its value can change after this method has been called.
        This method should return immediately, even when the incoming data is not completely processed yet. When the processing of the incoming data leads to changing values of the returned Observable, the consumer of the ObservableValue can be notified.
        Returns:
        an instance of an implementation of Observable that contains or will contain the data retrieved by this Provider
